name: A Game That Has A Player And Monsters
name_original: A Game That Has A Player And Monsters
description:
hello these are the controls for animations, press R for speed dash, press H for Happy, press C to throw voodoo dolls.

     I'm sad I didn't get to finish it. I was close to finishing it, but the game was deleted one day. I hope the next game I make will be good and fun enough to play. I hope you enjoy this. (if you throw the voodoo dolls at the monsters they move.)
